controller

Class CineplexController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController
      • controller.CineplexController

  • public class CineplexController
extends DatabaseController
    A controller to perform storing and retrieval of Cineplex model to/from database. Also validates changes before committing any changes to database.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wong Jing Lun

    • Method Detail

      • getCinema

        public Cinema getCinema(int cinemaID)
        Find the cinema with the corresponding cinemaID from all the cineplex
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - Cinema ID of the cinema to find
        Returns:
        Cinema corresponding to the cinemaID if it exists. Returns null if cannot find such cinema.

      • getCineplexByCinemaID

        public Cineplex getCineplexByCinemaID(int cinemaID)

        Get the list of cineplex owned by the vendor
        Returns:
        List of cineplex

      • getInstance

        public static CineplexController getInstance()
        Gets the channel reference of the CineplexController. Creates the channel reference if it do not exists.
        Returns:
        Instance of Cineplex Controller.

      • readDB

        protected void readDB()
        Retrieve the Cineplex model from database. The order is as follows: Cineplex Name , Location of Cineplex, List of Cinema whichs includes CinemaID, Cinema Classtype, Seats Layout These variables are parsed into the Cineplex objects and stored when the Cineplex Controller is initalized.
        Specified by:
        readDB in class DatabaseController

      • writeDB

        protected void writeDB()
        Save the Cineplex model into database. Each file in the directory is a cineplex object. The order is as follows: Cineplex Name , Location of Cineplex, List of Cinema whichs includes CinemaID, Cinema Classtype, Seats Layout The first line in the file is the cineplex attributes. Subsequent lines are the cineplex's cinemas attributes.
        Specified by:
        writeDB in class DatabaseController
